title: Absolutely The Best Of Dennis Coffey [FLAC]
description:

This is the one to get. It boasts considerably better sound and a lengthier track list. The entirety of Evolution -- featuring the oft-sampled Top Ten R&B hit Ã¢â‚¬Å“ScorpioÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ and a grinding version of Led Zeppelin's Ã¢â‚¬Å“Whole Lotta LoveÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ -- is scattered throughout the sequence, while smart selections from the other three albums -- including the number 11 R&B hit "Taurus," "Son of Scorpio," and "Theme from Enter the Dragon" -- take up the other half of the disc. Prime instrumental funk informed by acid rock, gutsy soul, and street-level jazz.
